description: Myoudouin Itsuki becomes Cure Sunshine to rescue Tsubomi and Erika from danger with Potpourri while saving her brother`s Heart Flower. As Cure Sunshine, her theme color is Gold and her flower symbol is the Sunflower. Her powers are related to the sun and can use auxiliary attacks in addition to her finishing attack. Her catchphrase is "The darkness in your heart, I`ll illuminate it with my light!"
name: Cure Sunshine
